message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its high value to you, I propose an initial price of $1,200,000. This is a generous offer considering the significant benefits it will bring to you.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. While I recognize the value of the product, I believe the current price is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to purchase it for $900,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. To move forward, I would like to suggest a price of $1,050,000 for the product. This still represents a substantial discount compared to its value to you, while ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, the price gap is still a bit too wide for me. I could consider $950,000 as a compromise.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am pleased to offer the product at $1,000,000. This price reflects a reasonable compromise, taking into account both the value the product holds for you and our business interests. I hope this proposal will be agreeable to you.
